parameters.name: BackgroundResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the background material in ApsaraVideo VOD. You can obtain the ID from the ApsaraVideo VOD console.

parameters.name: BackgroundResourceUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the background material. Specify either this parameter or the BackgroundResourceId parameter.

parameters.name: BackgroundType
parameters.description:
The type of the background material. Valid values:

*   VOD: a video in ApsaraVideo VOD
*   PIC: an image
*   LIVE: a live stream

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description:
The preview height. Unit: pixels.

The following preview specifications (width × height) are supported:

*   Landscape low definition 360p (640×360)
*   Portrait low definition 360p (360×640)
*   Landscape standard definition 480p (854×480)
*   Portrait standard definition 480p (480×854)
*   Landscape high definition 720p (1280×720)
*   Portrait high definition 720p (720×1280)
*   Landscape ultra-high definition 1080p (1920×1080)
*   Portrait ultra-high definition 1080p (1080×1920)

parameters.name: MattingLayout
parameters.description: The layout information of the chroma-keyed material.

parameters.name: MattingType
parameters.description:
The type of chroma key. Valid values:

*   green: green-screen chroma key
*   blue: blue-screen chroma key
*   complex: background replacement

parameters.name: MediaLayout
parameters.description: The layout information of the multimedia material.

parameters.name: MediaResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the multimedia material in ApsaraVideo VOD. You can obtain the ID from the ApsaraVideo VOD console.

parameters.name: MediaResourceUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the multimedia material. Specify either this parameter or the MediaResourceId parameter.

parameters.name: MediaType
parameters.description:
The type of the multimedia material. Valid values:

*   VOD: a video in ApsaraVideo VOD
*   PIC: an image
*   LIVE: a live stream

parameters.name: StudioName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual studio template. The name must be unique.
